admreg: Europe and Central Asia,Europe and Central Asia
subsc: General industry and trade sector,Oil and gas,General finance sector,Compulsory pension and unemployment insurance,General agriculture, fishing and forestry sector

abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of the Second
            Rehabilitation Loan Project are: 1) to support the
            Government's program for macroeconomic stabilization
            during 1995; and 2) to support an agreed program of
            structural reform including trade policies, oil export
            procedures, pricing and pro-competition measures, and other
            actions. The proceeds of the loan will be used to finance
            imports at the market exchange rate by public sector and
            private enterprises. The Central Bank will transfer local
            counterpart funds in an amount equivalent to the loan to the
            Ministry of Finance to be used as non-inflationary budgetary finance.
